title: Grant an ad account exclusive authorization for a TikTok Shop

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TikTok Shop. To obtain a TikTok Shop that is available for GMV Max Campaigns, use /gmv_max/store/list/ and confirm that the returned is_gmv_max_available is true .

parameters.name: store_authorized_bc_id
parameters.description: ID of the Business Center that owns the TikTok Shop ( store_id ). To confirm that a Business Center owns a TikTok Shop, use /gmv_max/store/list/ and check whether the returned is_owner_bc for the ID in store_authorized_bc_id is true .

parameters.name: advertiser_id
parameters.description: The ID of the ad account that you want to exclusively authorize to create GMV Max Campaigns for the TikTok Shop. To obtain the list of ad accounts within a Business Center, use /bc/asset/get/ and set asset_type to ADVERTISER .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.
